column2: INSTANCE_BIND(creature kill binds instance to killer and killer's group)
CIVILIAN(creature does not aggro - ignore faction/reputation hostility)
NO_PARRY(creature does not parry)
NO_PARRY_HASTEN(creature does not counter-attack at parry)
NO_BLOCK(creature does not block)
NO_CRUSH(creature does not do crush-attacks)
NO_XP_AT_KILL(creature kill does not give XP)
TRIGGER(creature is trigger-NPC - invisible to players only)
NO_TAUNT(creature is immune to taunt-auras and "attack me"-effects)
NO_MOVE_FLAGS_UPDATE (creature won't update movement flags)
GHOST_VISIBILITY (creature will be only visible for dead players)
USE_OFFHAND_ATTACK (creature will use offhand attacks)
NO_SELL_VENDOR (players can't sell items to this vendor)
UNUSED_13
WORLDEVENT(custom flag for world events - left room for merging)
GUARD(creature is a guard - will ignore feign death and vanish)
UNUSED_16
NO_CRIT(creature does not do critical strikes)
NO_SKILLGAIN(creature won't increase weapon skills)
TAUNT_DIMINISH(Taunt is a subject to diminishing returns on this creautre)
ALL_DIMINISH(creature is subject to all diminishing returns as player are)
EXTRA_NO_PLAYER_DAMAGE_REQ (creature does not need to take player damage for kill credit)

DUNGEON_BOSS(creature is a dungeon boss (SET DYNAMICALLY, DO NOT ADD IN DB))
IGNORE_PATHFINDING (creature ignore pathfinding)
IMMUNITY_KNOCKBACK (creature is immune to knockback effects)
